EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Email sent to Applicant when change request is updated.
EmailTemplate.name: Change Request Notification to Applicant
EmailTemplate.subject: Change Request Inititated {!ChangeRequest__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Notification of Change Request {!ChangeRequest__c.Name} initiation for the Grant # {!ChangeRequest__c.Award__c}
Hello {!Application__c.OwnerFullName},
Please make the changes required for the Application({!Application__c.Name}) and resubmit it.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely, EGMS Team
